dunGen

Class Helper

                              com.sk89q.worldedit.Vector v1,

        Fills the volum between v1 and v2 in world w with Material m
        Parameters:
        w - The worls were this is to be generated.
        v1 - One volume corner.
        v2 - The other corner.

      • rotateBoolMatrixClockw

        public static boolean[][] rotateBoolMatrixClockw(boolean[][] mat,
                                                 int degree)
        Rotates a matrix clockwise. Returns null if the degrees are not multiple of 90! It works by copying over the values but doing this in reverse or rotated order.
        Parameters:
        mat - The matrix to be rotated
        degree - Valid are of course only multiples of 90!
        Returns:
        The rotated matrix, a copy.
